data.title: Robert Bontine Cunninghame Graham, his life & works by WEST, H:: Good Hardcover (1932) 1st Edition.
data.meta_description: 1st Edition. - Hardcover - Cranley & Day - 1932 - Condition: Good - 6 plts; 288pp, 225 x 140mm; bl. clth( ex Boots Library); (with PICTURE) 0.0 - Robert Bontine Cunninghame Graham, his life & works

Terms of Sale:

Any item may be returned within 10 days if not as described. All items remain the property of Books & Things until paid for. Martin Steenson, PO Box 388, Stroud GL6 1GG 01453750774 martin@booksandthings.co.uk

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required. All items sent abroad with a value of Â£50 or over will only be sent by Tracked & Signed and charged accordingly. This will also apply to any item sent to China or Russia. Martin Steenson
